purpose: Provide a unified interface to build, test, and manage AI agents efficiently.
principle: Leverages modern web technologies to offer a centralized UI for managing AI agent workflows, including testing and deployment.
reusability: Designed as a central hub for AI agent management, it can be integrated with various AI frameworks and platforms via plugins or extensions.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack features for full-scale production deployment, and could have limited support for certain AI frameworks.
name: BotSharp-UI
description: Build, test and manage your AI Agents in the central place.
